metadata.title: CVE-2020-11947 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: iscsi_aio_ioctl_cb in block/iscsi.c in QEMU 4.1.0 has a heap-based buffer over-read that may disclose unrelated information from process memory to an attacker.

criterions.comment: qemu package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:5.2+dfsg-2ubuntu1').
